text: Fourteen sovereigns of gold and Rs.1.75 lakh were stolen from a house here. The front door was found broken open. Investigations revealed that K. Mohammed Sarith (33), the complainant, left for his relative’s house at Mettupatti on Saturday. Fingerprint experts examined the spot. Sniffer dog was also brought to the spot. Tuticorin North police have filed a case.
title: House burgled
